classes.docstring:
"""
    A default context mixin that passes the keyword arguments received by
    get_context_data() as the template context.
    """
classes.name: ContextMixin

classes.docstring:
"""
    Intentionally simple parent class for all views. Only implements
    dispatch-by-method and simple sanity checking.
    """
classes.name: View

classes.docstring: """A mixin that can be used to render a template."""
classes.name: TemplateResponseMixin

classes.docstring:
"""
    Render a template. Pass keyword arguments from the URLconf to the context.
    """
classes.name: TemplateView

classes.docstring: """Provide a redirect on any GET request."""
classes.name: RedirectView
